content: if you re looking to stay cozy this fall and winter with a gorgeous crochet pocket scarf look no further this snowbank pocket scarf crochet pattern is great for beginner and experienced crocheters alike as it uses only half_double_crochet this pocket scarf crochet pattern is as easy as pie - no creating separate pockets to sew on you will love the diagonal ribbing of this scarf which creates an on the bias look to the top of the pockets with plenty of room for any size hands this scarf with pockets will be your go to this pattern is available for free on my blog theloopholefox com by purchasing the pattern here you are purchasing a downloadable ad free pdf pattern this is a great beginner project as it mostly uses half_double_crochet with a little single_crochet it s also great for experienced crocheters who want a timeless pattern that takes them back to basics **finished pocket scarf size ** 6 inches wide by 74 inches long **scarf pocket depth ** approximately 6 5 inches at center **you will need ** a medium 4 aran weight yarn of your choice approximately 8 oz or 410 yards a 5mm hook and your favorite show to watch in the background make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love i m @theloopholefoxcrochet i hope you love the snowbank crochet pocket scarf pattern as much as i do happy crocheting the loophole fox
